column6: Gladiator STEVE ROGERS, his trusty steed DEVIL DINOSAUR and the mysterious DOC GREEN go deeper into one of the most dangerous domains of BATTLEWORLD, the HULK infested territory known as GREENLAND! WILD HULKS in the jungle! GIANT HULKS in lakes of fire! But is the journey the most perilous part of this hellish mission or is it one of the travelers?
column8: | penciller (cover):Mike Del Mundo | writer:Sam Humphries | artist:Marc Laming
